content.rendered:
Air Serbia is the flag carrier of Serbia. It was founded on 1927. The company’s head office is in Belgrade, Serbia, and its main hub is Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport. In 2016, it was the fourth-largest legacy carrier in Central and Eastern Europe. The airline was formerly known as Jat Airways until it was renamed and commenced operations under its new name in 2013.

 

Air Serbia Stockholm, Sweden Address:
AVIATOR
Arlanda Airport
Terminal 5, Departure Hall

Phone:
46 8 4374 6999
* After 17:00 service provided in Serbian and English.
** Service available 00-24 only in Serbian and English.

Email: ticketoffice.arn@aviator.eu; stockholmto@airserbia.com

Working hours
Monday – Friday: 09:00 – 17:00 *Saturday and Sunday: 00:00 – 24:00; Airport office: Monday to Sunday: 2.5 hours before departure

Air Serbia Official website: https://www.airserbia.com/en/

Air Serbia Online Check-in: www.Air Serbia.com/in/gb/online check-in

Note: Check-in Online 36 hours up until approx. 1 hour before departure

Check Air Serbia schedule here: www.Air Serbia.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Air Serbia flight status here: www.Air Serbia.com/in/gb/flight status

Air Serbia Baggage Allowance

Air Serbia Baggage

View Air Serbia Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Air Serbia Customer care

Working hours: 24 / 7

From Serbia: (the call is free for all Serbian networks) 0800 111 528

From the US: + 1 (718) 7258642

*the call will be charged in accordance with the tariff of the network

US toll-free number for guests requiring special assistance + 1 (888) 3909847

Calling from other countries: +381 11 311 21 23

*the call will be charged in accordance with the tariff of the network

Travel during Pregnancy in Air Serbia:

Expectant mothers can travel up to 36th week of pregnancy in Air Serbia. For more information, contact Air Serbia customer care number.

Queries handled by Air Serbia Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Etihad Guest
